timeline.bodyText: you can remove action from onNew event as canNew is false.
timeline.author: vbh-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@
 	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
 	xsi:schemaLocation="http://axelor.com/xml/ns/object-views http://axelor.com/xml/ns/object-views/object-views_5.4.xsd">
 	
-	<form name="app-sale-config-form" title="App sale" model="com.axelor.apps.base.db.AppSale" canDelete="false" canNew="false" width="large">
+	<form name="app-sale-config-form" title="App sale" model="com.axelor.apps.base.db.AppSale" canDelete="false" canNew="false" width="large" onNew="action-sale-attrs-set-hidden" onLoad="action-sale-attrs-set-hidden">
